page.title: 09HOUSING IN LOCHANS AREA
page.content: At the top of the Lochans starting around{Millview Terrace}there is a council housing scheme. This area comprises mainly of semi-detatched housing. The houses are brick and 2 storey approximately past{1940. However, even although the houses are in reasonably good condition there has only been one bought. At the top of{ {Thorn Street}the houses turn into terrace houses each having its own garden. This is an area of old age pensioners houses. At the top of{Cairn {Terrace}which are semi-detached and only one storey. As you head down the street the housing changes from council to private one or two storey terraced houses. Many of these house date{pre 1900}and are built of stone as well as brick. These houses are in good condition for their age and the oldest was dated{1890.}
